docs.snippet: There are 13 Helena Rubinsteins hanging in a room at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Madame, as she was known to her family and staff, looking imperious in the large portrait by Graham Sutherland, dominates the room. In it she wears a Chinese-red ...
docs.lead_paragraph: There are 13 Helena Rubinsteins hanging in a room at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. Madame, as she was known to her family and staff, looking imperious in the large portrait by Graham Sutherland, dominates the room. In it she wears a Chinese-red brocade dress by Balenciaga; her throat, ears and red-tipped fingers are piled with some of her famous jewels.
docs.abstract: Gala party is held on Jan 29 to celebrate opening of exhibit of 13 portraits of Helena Rubinstein, hosted by Helena Rubinstein Foundation and co; illus (M)

headline.main: Art Devoted to Helena Rubinstein: 13 Views of a Cosmetic Empress

docs.snippet: BUFFALO, Jan. 31 (AP)-- John Havlicek tallied 26 points tonight and became the fourth-leading scorer in National Basketball Association history as the Boston Celtics posted a 109-100 victory over the Buffalo Braves....
docs.lead_paragraph: BUFFALO, Jan. 31 (AP)-- John Havlicek tallied 26 points tonight and became the fourth-leading scorer in National Basketball Association history as the Boston Celtics posted a 109-100 victory over the Buffalo Braves.

headline.main: Celtics Win As Havlicek Hits for 26

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan.29 A House subcommittee sought to show today that some natural gas producers have been holding production below maximum rates and could reap big profits from enactment of a natural gas deregulation bill that comes before the House ...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan.29 A House subcommittee sought to show today that some natural gas producers have been holding production below maximum rates and could reap big profits from enactment of a natural gas deregulation bill that comes before the House next week.
docs.abstract: Oscar Strongin, geologist retained by House subcom on Oversight and Investigations, says his study of production in Gulf of Mex indicates either that producers are failing to maintain and operate offshore wells properly or that they are underproducing and withholding significant quantities of natural gas from mkt, Jan 29 subcom hearing; Geological Survey Dir Vincent E McKelvey and Natural Gas Com exec dir David H Foster hold figures do not indicate that supplies are being withheld; chmn John E Moss appears to support McKelvey (M)

headline.main: House Unit Tries to Show Holdback in Gas Supplies; House Panel questions Gas Producers

docs.snippet: The Senate confirmed Anne L. Armstrong unanimously yesterday as the nation's first woman Ambassador to Britain and Northern Ireland. The action was by voice vote after Senator Mike Mansfield of Montana, the Democratic majority leader, spoke to com...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Senate confirmed Anne L. Armstrong unanimously yesterday as the nation's first woman Ambassador to Britain and Northern Ireland. The action was by voice vote after Senator Mike Mansfield of Montana, the Democratic majority leader, spoke to commend President Ford for "an excellent appointment."
